pr_title: CLDR-14122 Bulk close some open forum posts

timeline.message:
CLDR-14122 Bulk close some open forum posts

-New Bulk Close Posts command in gear menu, for Admin only

-New SurveyBulkClosePosts.java

-New CldrStBulkClosePosts.js, special/bulk_close_posts.js

-Move equalsOrInheritsCurrentValue to XMLSource.java

-New method SurveyForum.closeThreads, use also for PostType.CLOSE

-New TestCldrStBulkClosePosts.js, bulk_close_posts_json.js

timeline.bodyText: this is so close to being a REST API… in my mind I can almost see the @-annotations on each function!
timeline.author: srl295

replies.bodyText: There really should be a progress bar, since the db queries could take a minute or more, for thousands of posts. Let's decide on a uniform way to implement progress bars for all potentially long-running server tasks. Cf. https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/CLDR-14251
replies.author: btangmu
